name: 淑女同萌！/ HELLO LADY!
description: HELLO LADY! is a Visual Novel game that tells a glory school story about youth, love, and revenge. The game is made by famous Japanese developer AKATSUKI WORKS. Welcome to cooperate, fight and fall in love with the young ladies!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: Core2Duo 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256M Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: PCM
